Title: Authorizes educational institutions to pay the salaries and compensation of school resource officers
Summary: Authorizes educational institutions to agree to pay for all or a portion of the salaries and compensation payable to municipal school resource officers.
LawCode: Add ยง208-i, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing educational institutions to pay the salaries and compensation of school resource officers
